name: Candle Snuffers
description:
"Spirits of Christmas, unite! We need to save the tree from a huge fire hazard."

A small Christmas playground by @firepunchd & @bekokstover to play with your friends and family. 1-10 players, controllers required.

This game was created in roughly one day at the November 2016 Berlin Mini Jam, and first demoed at the A MAZE M4rk3t. We made some cosmetic changes afterwards.
